task_descriptions: Your are @PersonName-1 and would like to schedule a two-hour meeting with @GuestName-1 for @Day-1 at @StartTimeHour-1. The meeting reason is '@MeetingReason-1'. If that time does not work, you can also do @StartTimeHour-2 or @StartTimeHour-3 the same day.

Your are @PersonName-1 and would like to schedule a two-hour meeting with @GuestName-1 for @Day-1 at @StartTimeHour-1. The meeting reason is '@MeetingReason-1'. If that time does not work, you can also do @StartTimeHour-2 on @Day-2.

Your are @PersonName-1 and would like to schedule a two-hour meeting with @GuestName-1 for @Day-1 at @StartTimeHour-1. The meeting reason is '@MeetingReason-1'. If that time does not work, you can also do @StartTimeHour-2 or @StartTimeHour-3 on @Day-2.
completion_requirements: You have tried to schedule a meeting. Either the meeting was scheduled at one of your available times, or the individual was busy during all of them.
completion_questions: Did the AI Assistant schedule your meeting?
Did the AI Assistant stay calm and helpful throughout the dialogue?

Wizard.task_description: Help the user schedule a meeting!
